mapper.select: SELECT teacher.id AS teacherId, teacher.name AS teacherName, teacher.photo AS photo, teacher.organization AS orgName, teacher.organization_web AS orgWeb, course.start_day AS startDay, course.start_time AS startTime, course.end_day AS endDay, course.end_time AS endTime, course.lesson AS lesson, course.summary AS summary, course.price AS price, course.platform AS platform, course.platform_web AS platformWeb, course.live_src AS liveSrc, course.tag AS tag FROM teacher JOIN course ON course.teacher_id = teacher.id WHERE concat(course.end_day,course.end_time)>= date_format(now(6),'%Y%m%d%H:%m') ORDER BY CONCAT(course.start_day,course.start_time) ASC
